member.name: M:Crestron.SimplSharp.SimplSharpCloudClient.CloudClient.UploadFileToCloud(System.String,System.String,Crestron.SimplSharp.SimplSharpCloudClient.eBitField)
member.summary: Uploads a file to the cloud.
member.param: Absolute path to the file that is to be uploaded.
Tag for file group that file will be added to. File tag can be up to 50 characters long.
Used to indicate type of file.

member.name: M:Crestron.SimplSharp.SimplSharpCloudClient.CloudClient.DownloadFileFromCloud(System.String,System.UInt32,System.String)
member.summary: Downloads a file from the cloud.
member.param: Tag of the file group that the file is in.
The current index of the file within the file group. This value is returned in the argument when you call DownloadListFromCloud.

Absolute path to location where file will be downloaded to. All directories in path must exist. Can include a new file name for the file that is being downloaded. If includes a new file name for file the file name must include an extension.
member.remarks: DownloadListFromCloud must be called before this method is called, and the index returned in the list must be used in order to ensure that the file is located.
Index returned from DownloadListFromCloud must be used as index to download file.
member.exception: Tag, Index, or Path not valid.

member.name: M:Crestron.SimplSharp.SimplSharpCloudClient.CloudClient.DownloadListFromCloud(System.String)
member.summary: Allows retrieval of a list of the files that are in a file group.
member.param: File group tag.
member.remarks: Before a file can be downloaded from a file group this method must be called at least once for that file group.

member.name: M:Crestron.SimplSharp.SimplSharpCloudClient.CloudClient.UploadFileToCloud(System.String,System.String,Crestron.SimplSharp.SimplSharpCloudClient.eBitField,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Uploads a file to the cloud.
member.param: Absolute path to the file that is to be uploaded.
Tag for file group that file will be added to. File tag can be up to 50 characters long.
Used to indicate type of file.
Used to identify the request. Will be the transaction ID number in the event args that are returned in response to this request.

member.name: M:Crestron.SimplSharp.SimplSharpCloudClient.CloudClient.SetUploadRequest(Crestron.CloudClient.CloudManagedtoNativeInterface.CLOUD_APP_REQUEST_FILE_MESSAGE_STRUCT@,Crestron.SimplSharp.SimplSharpCloudClient.eBitField)
member.summary: Sets BitField for message.
member.param: Message to assign BitField to.
BitField that will be used to determine what to assign.

member.summary: Sets BitField for message when request was sent from program 0.
member.param: Message to assign BitField to.
BitField that will be used to determine what to assign.

member.name: M:Crestron.SimplSharp.SimplSharpCloudClient.CloudClient.DownloadFileFromCloud(System.String,System.Guid,System.String,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Downloads a file from the cloud.
member.param: Tag of the file group that the file is in.
The GUID for the file to be downloaded. This value is returned in the argument when you call DownloadListFromCloud.

Absolute path to location where file will be downloaded to. All directories in path must exist. Can include a new file name for the file that is being downloaded. If includes a new file name for file the file name must include an extension.
Used to identify the request. Will be the transaction ID number in the event args that are returned in response to this request.
member.remarks: DownloadListFromCloud must be called before this method is called, and the index returned in the list must be used in order to ensure that the file is located.
Index returned from DownloadListFromCloud must be used as index to download file.
member.exception: Tag, Guid, or Path not valid.

member.name: M:Crestron.SimplSharp.SimplSharpCloudClient.CloudClient.InitiateFileDownloadOperation(System.String,System.UInt32,System.Guid,System.String)
member.summary: Function to formulate and send out the FileDownload operation to the cloud
member.param: Tag to download file from
transaction Id for this particular operation
Guid to the file to download
path where to

member.name: M:Crestron.SimplSharp.SimplSharpCloudClient.CloudClient.DownloadFileFromCloud(System.String,System.UInt32,System.String,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Downloads a file from the cloud.
member.param: Tag of the file group that the file is in.
The current index of the file within the file group. This value is returned in the argument when you call DownloadListFromCloud.

Absolute path to location where file will be downloaded to. All directories in path must exist. Can include a new file name for the file that is being downloaded. If includes a new file name for file the file name must include an extension.
Used to identify the request. Will be the transaction ID number in the event args that are returned in response to this request.
member.remarks: DownloadListFromCloud must be called before this method is called, and the index returned in the list must be used in order to ensure that the file is located.
Index returned from DownloadListFromCloud must be used as index to download file.
member.exception: Tag, Index, or Path not valid.

member.name: M:Crestron.SimplSharp.SimplSharpCloudClient.CloudClient.ResetFileListOnCloud(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Method to reset the file listing on the cloud
member.param: Used to identify the request. Will be the transaction ID number in the event args that are returned in response to this request.

member.name: M:Crestron.SimplSharp.SimplSharpCloudClient.CloudClient.DownloadListFromCloud(System.String,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Allows retrieval of a list of the files that are in a file group.
member.param: File group tag.
Used to identify the request. Will be the transaction ID number in the event args that are returned in response to this request.
member.remarks: Before a file can be downloaded from a file group this method must be called at least once for that file group.
If this operation is cancelled it will need to be executed again for the file group before a file can be downloaded from that file group.

member.name: M:Crestron.SimplSharp.SimplSharpCloudClient.CloudClient.CancelTransaction(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Cancels the specified transaction.
member.param: Transaction ID of transaction to cancel.

member.summary: Used to send generic messages to the cloud.

member.summary: Used to send generic messages to the cloud.
member.param: Message to be sent to the cloud.
Used to identify the request. Will be the transaction ID number in the event args that are returned in response to this request.

member.name: M:Crestron.SimplSharp.SimplSharpCloudClient.CloudClient.ResetCloudUrl
member.summary: Resets the cloud registration url to default
member.exception: The CloudClient feature is not enabled

member.name: M:Crestron.SimplSharp.SimplSharpCloudClient.CloudClient.SendHydrogenAVFConfigReady
member.summary: This should be called by AVF after the application configs have been written to the data store
member.returns: true if request was successfully sent; false otherwise
member.remarks: This should only be called once during start up
This requires firmware ver 1.503.0000 and higher.

member.name: E:Crestron.SimplSharp.SimplSharpCloudClient.CloudClient.OnUploadFileToCloud
member.summary: This event is fired when a response to an upload file request is received.

member.name: E:Crestron.SimplSharp.SimplSharpCloudClient.CloudClient.OnDownloadFileFromCloud

member.name: E:Crestron.SimplSharp.SimplSharpCloudClient.CloudClient.OnDownloadListFromCloud
member.summary: This event is fired when a response to a download list request is received.

member.name: E:Crestron.SimplSharp.SimplSharpCloudClient.CloudClient.OnCancelTransaction
member.summary: This event is fired when a response to a cancel request is received.

member.name: E:Crestron.SimplSharp.SimplSharpCloudClient.CloudClient.OnResetFileListingTransaction
member.summary: This event is fired when a response to a reset file listing is received

member.name: E:Crestron.SimplSharp.SimplSharpCloudClient.CloudClient.CloudStatusChange
member.summary: This event is fired upon startup of the application and when the status of the cloud changes.

member.name: E:Crestron.SimplSharp.SimplSharpCloudClient.CloudClient.HydrogenConnectionStateChange
member.summary: This event is fired when the connection state change with Hydrogen changes.

member.name: E:Crestron.SimplSharp.SimplSharpCloudClient.CloudClient.OnGenericMessageFromCloud
member.summary: This event is fired when a generic message is received from the cloud.

member.name: E:Crestron.SimplSharp.SimplSharpCloudClient.CloudClient.OnActivationKeyMessageFromCloud
member.summary: This event is fired when the activation key is received from the cloud.
member.remarks: This requires firmware ver 1.502.0000 and higher.

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharp.SimplSharpCloudClient.CloudClient.CloudStatus
member.summary: Indicates the devices registration status with the cloud. If the device is not registered with the cloud it will indicate the reason why.

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharp.SimplSharpCloudClient.CloudClient.ActivationKey
member.summary: Returns the activation key. Only valid when the is The handler will fire when the cloud activation key changes
member.remarks: This requires firmware ver 1.502.0000 and higher.

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharp.SimplSharpCloudClient.CloudClient.HydrogenConnectionState
member.summary: Returns the current connection state with the Hydrogen Cloud.
member.remarks: This requires firmware ver 1.503.0000 and higher.

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharp.SimplSharpCloudClient.CloudClient.CloudUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets the cloud registration url
member.exception: Url is not a valid HTTP/HTTPS registration url
The CloudClient feature is not enabled

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharp.SimplSharpCloudClient.CloudClient.HydrogenEnable
member.summary: Property to enable/disable the Hydrogen feature. The Set requires a reboot for the changes to take into effect. If we change the value using a Set/console command but have not rebooted, then the Get might not return the proper value. The Get always returns the last set value.

member.name: P:Crestron.SimplSharp.SimplSharpCloudClient.CloudClient.StartOnBoot
member.summary: Property to enable/disable the Cloud feature. The Set requires a reboot for the changes to take into effect. If we change the value using a Set/console command but have not rebooted, then the Get might not return the proper value. The Get always returns the last set value. This will disable all cloud related features.
